officialTitle: The Use of Oral Naloxone to Prevent Post Spinal Fusion Ileus
inclusionCriteria:
* Patients will be included if they are having an in-patient spinal fusion procedure, are 18 years or older, post and post-operative pain control plan includes opioid medications.
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria: * Pregnancy, age \< 18, nursing, or documented allergy to naloxone
